quote.registrar: Computershare Hong Kong Investor Services Ltd.
quote.issuer_name: Mao Geping Cosmetics Co., Ltd. - H Shares
quote.nm: Mao Geping Cosmetics Co., Ltd. - H Shares
quote.summary: Mao Geping Cosmetics Co Ltd is a China-based company primarily engaged in the beauty business. The Company mainly operates three businesses. The product offerings business is engaged in offering portfolio of color cosmetics and skincare products under the beauty brands, MAOGEPING and Love Keeps. The makeup artistry training business is engaged in the provision of comprehensive in-person makeup training programs. The experiential and personalized customer service business is engaged in the provision of customized consultations and proficient makeup trial services to customers at counters. The Company's products include foundation, highlighting and contouring, eye makeup, lip makeup, luxury caviar facial mask and other products. The Company's skin care products mainly include face creams, eye care, facial masks, essences and cleansers. The Company mainly conducts its business in the domestic market.
